00013 /********** assembly *read_amber_prmtop(fileset F) **********/
00014 /* Main function for reading the prmtop file 
00015  * the amber_prmtop *P should be -already- allocated and initialized 
00016  * BUT, it should be otherwise empty  */
00017 void read_amber_prmtop_asis(fileset F,amber_prmtop *P){
00018 int aa=0,anl=0,sec=0,ent=0,fld=0; // generic, line, section, entry & field counters
00019 int newflag=0,newline=0,iseof=1; // utility flags
00020 char line[501],over[501],tmp[81],*s1,*s2,*fgets_check; 
00021 fpos_t line_current;
00022 
00023 // Open files and initialize some variables
00024 //F.F=myfreopen(F.N,"r",F.F); // don't depend on calling function to have opened
00025 F.F=myfopen(F.N,"r"); // 
00026 P[0].FN=strdup(F.N); // the name of the file from which these data were taken
00027 P[0].nS=0; // the prmtop structure should be empty
00028 P[0].S=(amber_prmtop_section*)calloc(1,sizeof(amber_prmtop_section));
00029 P[0].SN=(char**)calloc(1,sizeof(char*));
00030 
00031 //
00032 // Get the first line, which should be the "VERSION"
00033 //
00034 if(fgets(line,500,F.F)==NULL){read_fneek("Problem in read_amber_prmtop",1,0,F.N);}
00035 // See if the first 500 chars includes a newline...
00036 if(strchr(line,'\n')==NULL){ // if we didn't get the whole line
00037         fld=500;
00038         fprintf(stderr,"Unusually long VERSION line.\n");
00039         fprintf(stderr,"-- Ignoring characters beyond 500.\n");
00040         if(fgets(over,500,F.F)==NULL){// try to get rest of line
00041                 read_fneek("Problem reading VERSION line in read_amber_prmtop.",1,fld,F.N);}
00042         while(strchr(over,'\n')==NULL){// try to get rest of line
00043                 fld+=500;
00044                 if(fgets(over,500,F.F)==NULL){
00045                         read_fneek("Problem readin VERSION line in read_amber_prmtop.",1,fld,F.N);}
00046                 }
00047         } // close lengthy line check...
00048 if(strncmp("\%VERSION",line,8)!=0){
00049         read_eek("First line not \%VERSION.",F.N);}
00050 P[0].VERSION=strdup(line); 
00051 anl=2;
00052 fld=0;
00053 //
00054 // grab next line, which should be a flag line
00055 //
00056 if(fgets(line,500,F.F)==NULL){ 
00057         read_fneek("Problem in read_amber_prmtop",anl,fld,F.N);} 
00058 // Check the line -- it should be a short-ish FLAG line
00059 
00060 //printf("FLAG line read from top is >>>%s<<<\n",line);
00061 
00062 if(strchr(line,'\n')==NULL){// die if line too long
00063 read_eek("FLAG line over 500 chars... \n",F.N);}
00064 //
00065 // Read the FLAG entry
00066 //
00067 if(strncmp("\%FLAG",line,5)!=0){ // must start with %FLAG
00068 read_fneek("Entry not FLAG in read_amber_prmtop",anl,fld,F.N);}
00069 // Parse the FLAG line
00070 if(sscanf(line,"%s %s",over,tmp)!=2){mywhine("Problem in read_amber_prmtop with 1st FLAG read.");}
00071 newflag=0;
00072 //
00073 // Start main read of topology file
00074 // 
00075 while(newflag==0){// while we have found another flag entry
00076         // We have a FLAG entry, so increment the number of sections
00077 //printf("line (FLAG) is >>%s<<\n",line);
00078         sec=P[0].nS;
00079         P[0].nS++; 
00080         // Allocate memory 
00081         P[0].S=(amber_prmtop_section*)realloc(P[0].S,P[0].nS*sizeof(amber_prmtop_section));
00082         P[0].SN=(char**)realloc(P[0].SN,P[0].nS*sizeof(char*));
00083         P[0].SN[sec]=strdup(tmp); // record FLAG entry in
00084         P[0].S[sec].N=strdup(tmp); // both locations 
00085         //
00086         // Read the FORMAT entry
00087         // 
00088         anl++;
00089         if(fgets(line,500,F.F)==NULL){ // if we can't read the line, die
00090                 read_fneek("Problem in read_amber_prmtop.",anl,fld,F.N);}
00091 //printf("FORMAT line read from top is >>>%s<<<\n",line);
00092         if(strchr(line,'\n')==NULL){ // FORMAT lines should be short-ish
00093                 read_fneek("FORMAT line over 500 chars... \n",anl,fld,F.N);}
00094         if(strncmp("\%FORMAT",line,7)!=0){// must start with %FORMAT
00095                 read_fneek("Entry not FORMAT in read_amber_prmtop",anl,fld,F.N);} 
00096 //printf("line (FORMAT) is >>%s<<\n",line); 
00097         // split line by parentheses as tokens
00098         s1=strdup(strtok(line,"()"));// toss out the "%FORMAT" part
00099         P[0].S[sec].FORMAT=strdup(strtok(NULL,"()")); // save next
00100         s1=strdup(P[0].S[sec].FORMAT); // save a char string to tear apart
00101         // parse the format string
00102         s2=strdup(strtok(s1,"aAiIfFeE")); // up to the format identifier
00103         sscanf(s2,"%d",&P[0].S[sec].npl); // max entries expected per line
00104         s2=strdup(strtok(NULL,".")); // up to any periods
00105         if((strchr(s2,'S')!=NULL)||(strchr(s2,'N')!=NULL)){over[0]='0';} // EN or ES
00106         sscanf(s2,"%d",&P[0].S[sec].nc); // number of chars in format 
00107 //printf("parsed format:  npl is %d ; nc is %d \n",P[0].S[sec].npl,P[0].S[sec].nc);
00108         //
00109         // Read the section
00110         // 
00111         P[0].S[sec].D=(char**)calloc(1,sizeof(char*)); // initially allocate **D
00112         P[0].S[sec].nt=0; // total pieces of data found 
00113         ent=0;
00114         if(fgetpos(F.F,&line_current)!=0){mywhine("Problem getting line_start position in read_amber_prmtop.");}
00115         fgets_check=fgets(line,6,F.F);
00116         while(fgets_check!=NULL){
00117 //printf("the new section fgets's line is >>%s<<\n",line);
00118                 if(strcspn(line,"\0")==0){ //printf("found empty line\n");
00119                         if(fgetpos(F.F,&line_current)!=0){mywhine("Problem getting line_current position in read_amber_prmtop.");}
00120                         fgets_check=fgets(line,6,F.F);
00121                         continue;
00122                         }
00123                 anl++; // we have a new line
00124                 fld=0; // start field count over
00125                 // check to see if first 5 chars match "%FLAG"
00126                 if(strncmp(line,"\%FLAG",5)==0){ 
00127 //printf("found a FLAG line, resetting line start\n"); 
00128                         if(fsetpos(F.F,&line_current)!=0){mywhine("Problem resetting line_start position in read_amber_prmtop.");}
00129                         break;} // if so, stop this
00130                 if(strcspn(line,"\n")==0){
00131                         fprintf(stderr,"Unexpected blank line in read_amber_prmtop\n");
00132                         fprintf(stderr,"   at line number %d in file %s.  Ignoring.\n",anl,F.N);
00133                         fprintf(stderr,"The section (%d) FLAG is:  %s\n",sec,P[0].SN[sec]);
00134                         if(fgetpos(F.F,&line_current)!=0){mywhine("Problem getting line_current position in read_amber_prmtop.");}
00135                         fgets_check=fgets(line,6,F.F);
00136                         continue;
00137                         }
00138 // 
00139 // Now read the rest of the line...
00140 // 
00141 //printf("reading the rest of the line.\n");
00142 if(fsetpos(F.F,&line_current)!=0){mywhine("Problem resetting line_start position in read_amber_prmtop.");}
00143 newline=1;
00144 while(newline!=0){
00145         if(fgets(line,(P[0].S[sec].nc+1),F.F)==NULL){
00146                 read_fneek("problem reading data line in read_amber_prmtop",anl,ent,F.N);}
00147 //printf("the line-bit for P[0].S[sec].nc=%d is >>>%s<<<\n",P[0].S[sec].nc,line);
00148 //printf("in ascii decimal: ");
00149 //for(ae=0;ae<P[0].S[sec].nc+1;ae++){printf(" %d ",line[ae]);}
00150 //printf("\n");
00151         if(strcspn(line,"\0")==0){ //printf("found empty string\n");
00152                 newline=0;
00153                 break;}
00154         if(strcspn(line,"\n")==0){ // at end of line, no new data
00155                 newline=0;
00156                 break;}
00157         if(strchr(line,'\n')!=NULL){ // this is the end of a line, but with data 
00158                 for(aa=0;aa<strlen(line);aa++){ //check for all whitespace
00159                         if(isspace(line[aa])==0) newline=-1; // something isn't white
00160                         }
00161                 if(newline==-1){
00162                         line[strcspn(line,"\n")]='\0'; 
00163                         ent=P[0].S[sec].nt; // for convenience
00164                         // allocate space for the next entry
00165                         P[0].S[sec].nt++;
00166                         P[0].S[sec].D=(char**)realloc(P[0].S[sec].D,P[0].S[sec].nt*sizeof(char*));
00167                         P[0].S[sec].D[ent]=(char*)calloc(P[0].S[sec].nc+1,sizeof(char));
00168                         strncpy(P[0].S[sec].D[ent],line,P[0].S[sec].nc+1);
00169 //printf("the entry for P[0].S[%d].D[%d] is -now- >>>%s<<< ; nt is %d\n",sec,ent,P[0].S[sec].D[ent],P[0].S[sec].nt);
00170                         }
00171                 newline=0;
00172                 break;
00173                 }
00174         ent=P[0].S[sec].nt; // for convenience
00175         // allocate space for the next entry
00176         P[0].S[sec].nt++;
00177         P[0].S[sec].D=(char**)realloc(P[0].S[sec].D,P[0].S[sec].nt*sizeof(char*));
00178         P[0].S[sec].D[ent]=(char*)calloc(P[0].S[sec].nc+1,sizeof(char));
00179         strncpy(P[0].S[sec].D[ent],line,P[0].S[sec].nc+1); 
00180 //printf("the entry for P[0].S[%d].D[%d] is -now- >>>%s<<< ; nt is %d\n",sec,ent,P[0].S[sec].D[ent],P[0].S[sec].nt);
00181 //printf("the entry for P[0].S[%d].D[%d] is -now- >>>%s<<<\n",sec,ent,P[0].S[sec].D[ent]);
00182         } // close while not a new line
00183         if(fgetpos(F.F,&line_current)!=0){mywhine("Problem getting line_current position in read_amber_prmtop.");}
00184         fgets_check=fgets(line,6,F.F);
00185         }// close fgets within a section 
00186 
00187         if(newflag==-1){break;}
00188         if(fgets(line,500,F.F)==NULL){ 
00189                 if(fgetc(F.F)==EOF){
00190                         iseof=1;
00191                         newflag=-1;
00192                         break;}
00193                 else{read_fneek("Problem in FLAG line read read_amber_prmtop",anl,0,F.N);}
00194                 } 
00195         if(newflag==-1){break;}
00196         // If here, then we found a FLAG, read it in, exit loop and start new
00197         // Check the line -- it should be a short-ish FLAG line
00198         if(strchr(line,'\n')==NULL){// die if line too long
00199         read_eek("FLAG line over 500 chars... \n",F.N);}
00200         //
00201         // Read the FLAG entry
00202         //
00203         // Parse the FLAG line
00204 //printf("Flag line is >>>%s<<<\n",line);
00205         if(sscanf(line,"%s %s",over,tmp)!=2){
00206                 read_fneek("Problem FLAG entry scan, read_amber_prmtop.",anl,1,F.N);}
00207         } // close fgets for reading file
00208 
00209 fclose(F.F);
00210 
00211 
00212 F.F=myfopen("test_rewrite_of_prmtop","w");
00213 fprintf(F.F,"%s",P[0].VERSION);
00214 for(sec=0;sec<P[0].nS;sec++){ // for each section found
00215         fprintf(F.F,"%%FLAG %s\n",P[0].S[sec].N);
00216         fprintf(F.F,"%%FORMAT(%s)\n",P[0].S[sec].FORMAT);
00217         for(aa=0;aa<P[0].S[sec].nt;aa++){
00218                 fprintf(F.F,"%s",P[0].S[sec].D[aa]);
00219                 //fprintf(F.F,"D[%d] is >>>%s<<<\n",aa,P[0].S[sec].D[aa]);
00220                 fflush(F.F);
00221 //printf("\naa is %d ; P[0].S[%d].npl is %d ; (aa+1)%%npl is %d\n",aa,sec,P[0].S[sec].npl,);
00222                 if((((aa+1)%P[0].S[sec].npl))==0){fprintf(F.F,"\n");} 
00223                 //if((((aa+1)*P[0].S[sec].nc))%80==0){printf("\n");} 
00224                 }
00225         if(((aa)*P[0].S[sec].nc)%80!=0){fprintf(F.F,"\n");} 
00226         }
00227 fclose(F.F);
00228 
00229 
00230 return;
00231 }
